dcterms:creator: P. Lang
D. Tian
X. Duan
J. Zhou
Z. Sheng
V. C. M. Leung
dcterms:description: A framework for assessing the feasibility of different time-delay sensitive services in large-scale IoV, modeling the VANET as a graph by dividing the service area into subareas (nodes) connected by edges representing similar delay probabilities.
dcterms:title: SMART (Spatio-temporal Modeling And ReconsTruction) framework

dcterms:creator: Z. He
L. Wang
H. Ye
G. Y. Li
B.-H. F. Juang
dcterms:description: A distributed spectrum sharing framework enhanced by GNN for vehicular networks, representing the vehicular network as a graph with local observations of vehicle pairs as nodes and channel gains of interference links as edges.
dcterms:title: GNN-based distributed spectrum sharing framework

dcterms:creator: Y. He
X. Zhong
Y. Gan
H. Cui
M. Guizani
dcterms:description: A DDPG Hybrid of Graph Attention Network and Action Branching for Multi-Scale End-Edge-Cloud Vehicular Orchestrated Task Offloading, addressing task allocation in multi-scale IoV.
dcterms:title: Task allocation in multi-scale IoV

dcterms:creator: X. Zhou
M. Bilal
R. Dou
J. J. P. C. Rodrigues
Q. Zhao
J. Dai
X. Xu
dcterms:description: A computational task allocation method with demand prediction and reinforcement learning for IoT environments supported by 6G technology, utilizing a spatial-temporal GNN-based prediction method for task demand forecasting.
dcterms:title: Computational task allocation method with demand prediction

dcterms:creator: Z. Liu
L. Huang
Z. Gao
M. Luo
S. Hosseinalipour
H. Dai
dcterms:description: A GA-DRL algorithm for the subtask-to-vehicle assignment problem in Directed Acyclic Graph (DAG) tasks within IoV, integrating multi-head GAT networks to extract subtask feature information.
dcterms:title: GA-DRL algorithm for subtask-to-vehicle assignment problem

dcterms:creator: B. Xiao
R. Li
F. Wang
C. Peng
J. Wu
Z. Zhao
H. Zhang
dcterms:description: A Stochastic Graph Neural Network (SGNN) based value decomposition for multi-agent reinforcement learning in Internet of Vehicles, capturing dynamic topological connectivity features of vehicles.
dcterms:title: Stochastic Graph Neural Network (SGNN) for intelligent traffic control tasks

dcterms:creator: N. Chen
P. Zhang
N. Kumar
C.-H. Hsu
L. Abualigah
H. Zhu
dcterms:description: A resource orchestration algorithm for vehicular cloud computing networks, abstracting the resource orchestration problem into a virtual network embedding problem using a deep reinforcement learning architecture.
dcterms:title: Resource orchestration algorithm for vehicular cloud computing networks

dcterms:creator: Y. Li
Q. Xie
W. Wang
X. Zhou
K. Li
dcterms:description: A GCN-based topology design method (G-DFL) for decentralized federated learning in IoV, optimizing training delays to generate connection graphs.
dcterms:title: GCN-based topology design method (G-DFL)
